page.title: 15PENGWERN STABLES,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: The{stables}is situated on the outskirts of the town.The house itself is over{300 years old}and was originally a mill.The present owner converted some out buildings into stables about{15 years ago.}Today there are about{18 horses}at the stables. There are 8 different breeds. {Welsh Mountain}and{Connemara}are most popular.It costs{Â£400 a week}to run. The stables are cleaned out three times a day and the horses are groomed and exercised at least once a day.Four people work at the stables.Lessons cost{Â£5.00 an hour}and{Â£3.00 for half {an hour.}As the only{B.H.S.}approved school in{North Wales,}it attracts many riders from this country and abroad. The stables provide horse drawn carriage rides around Llangollen.
